articles.author: Clyde Russell
articles.title: Column: Coal and LNG's surge in Asia plays into renewable energy hands - Reuters
articles.description: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) and thermal coal prices in Asia have been roaring ahead in recent months amid strong demand, but while welcome news for the commodity producers, the rally is a longer-term boon to their main rival, renewable energy.

articles.title: Austria's AT&S picks Malaysia for RM8.5 billion factory, its first in Southeast Asia - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AT&S, the Austria-headquartered global manufacturing leader of high-end printed circuit boards (PCB) and integrated circuit (IC) substrates, has chosen Malaysia as its first production plant in Southeast Asia.
